(287x1+0)/1 mod 1024 = 287. (287x3+1)/2 mod 512 = 431. (287x9+5)/4 mod 256 = 135. (287x27+19)/8 mod 128 = 75. (287x81+65)/16 mod 64 = 49. (287x243+211)/32 mod 32 = 10. (287x243+211)/64 mod 16 = 5. (287x729+697)/128 mod 8 = 0. (287x729+697)/256 mod 4 = 0. (287x729+697)/512 mod 2 = 0. (287x729+697)/1024 mod 1 = 0.
